content: this crochet pattern for the jellyfish by sarah quillen creates a soft huggable stuffed jellyfish that measures approx 9 across and 11 long the terms are us the pattern includes an easy to follow layout with many pictures for reference the pattern is designed for blanket yarn but can also be done in worsted weight yarn with a size f hook and 10mm eyes to create a much smaller jellyfish for this pattern you will need o bernat blanket yarn o hook size us k 10 5 / 6 5mm o yarn needle o stitch marker o polyester fiberfill stuffing o 2 safety eyes 15mm
